attributes.action: Change the dictionairy definition of a collection of pigs from "Herd" to "Parliment"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, the dictionary definition for a collection of pigs is a "herd". I propose that this is replaced with the word "Parliament" as a more accurate and fitting description.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
